name: Shoot to the Brim!
description:
Shoot To The Brim

[PROTOTYPE]

This is a game where you are a litlle cube shooting evil ones, your goal is to reach the goal at the end of the Level, theere are 5 Levels!

This is  pototype of the game, so expect bugs/broken machanics

TIP:  The enemys are easier to defeat if you stay close to them

Hope you enjoy!
